channel.title: Chrome on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Chrome on Blog

item.title: Unified Plan SDP format released in Chrome 72+
item.description: Photo Source: Unsplash. Creative Commons Chrome 72+ goes into Unified Plan SDP (Phase 3) Google is planning to change the WebRTC implementation from the current SDP format called “Plan B” to a standards format “Unified Plan” over 4 phases. Chrome M72 version will be the first release to apply phase 3, and will require to upgrade sonn our Video RTC platform to run properly all this new SDP format.
